title: Delusion
description: 1891, England  Richard Wilford, The Earl of Westchester has recently inherited his fortune. The calculating man decides that all that he is missing is a wife by his side. A quiet refined lady has caught his eye and Richard is determined she will be the perfect choice.  Amelia Radley thought of herself as a rational person. So she gratefully accepts the Earl's proposal. Unfortunately, she finds herself unprepared for the trials marriage brings and the loneliness. Will she be able to find her way into her husbandâ€™s heart and find the happiness she now desires?  A slow-burning romance set in Victorian England.
author: Anne R. Bailey
